lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, April 2 (U.P.) -- Front dispatches indicated tonight that the main fighting in Central China had shifted north of the Yangtze River, with Chinese troops striking at Japanese garrisons and communication lines over a widespread area from Central Hupeh Province to Southern Honan.
abstract: Chinese try to divert Jap strength from Hupeh-Hunan border area south of Yangtze River; drive toward Anlu; raid Sinyang and Yuho; Jap planes raid Lishui
